message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and we can reassess in the next round.
I'll take a strong lead, but willing to negotiate further
You took a big lead last round, now it's my turn to try and catch up!
You're trying to catch up, but I'm still in the lead!

I'm taking everything, Alice. It's the last chance to get something.
